name: Role of law enforcement
text: [§583A-316]  Role of law enforcement.  At the request of the attorney general or county prosecuting attorney, as appropriate, acting under section 583A-315, a law enforcement officer may take any lawful action reasonably necessary to locate a child or a party and assist the attorney general or county prosecuting attorney with responsibilities under section 583A-315. [L 2002, c 124, pt of §2]
